results.raw_content:
# UN General Assembly

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![Split screen showing David Lamy earing a dark grey suit and black and white flowered tie and Tom Bateman in a navy suit.](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/87a8/live/b6641110-6cbf-11f0-89ea-4d6f9851f623.jpg.webp)

## BBC presses UK foreign secretary on timing of recognising Palestinian state

Prime Minister Keir Starmer says the plan will go ahead unless the Israeli government takes "substantive steps to end the appalling situation in Gaza".

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![Dorothy Camille Shea votes at the UN Security Council in New York, 24 February](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/ac2b/live/485ed210-f37d-11ef-8c03-7dfdbeeb2526.jpg.webp)

## US sides with Russia in UN resolutions on Ukraine

The UK and France abstain as the UN Security Council passes a text that does not criticise Moscow.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![French President Emmanuel Macron speaks during the 79th Session of the United Nations General Assembly at the United Nations headquarters in New York City on 25 September 2024](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/9f9a/live/d0a94190-7c3c-11ef-b282-4535eb84fe4b.jpg.webp)

## Trump or Harris? In a crisis-hit world, diplomats resigned to either

Behind the scenes at the United Nations, insiders tell the BBC they don't see major change whoever wins the White House.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![Keir Starmer addresses world leaders at the UN General Assembly in New York City](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/2bbd/live/39208770-7c91-11ef-8c1a-df523ba43a9a.jpg.webp)

## Starmer steps up call for ceasefire in Lebanon

The prime minister urged Israel and Hezbollah to "stop the violence" in his first speech to the UN General Assembly.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky smiles as he writes on a shell at an American munitions factory ](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/6367/live/6d3839a0-7984-11ef-b282-4535eb84fe4b.jpg.webp)

## Zelensky to present 'victory plan' to Biden, Harris and Trump

The Ukrainian leader is due to meet the US president before attending the UN General Assembly.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![The flag alley at the United Nations European headquarters is seen during the Human Rights Council in Geneva, Switzerland, September 11, 2023](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/15F9/production/_131252650_d023f0243e8f5c2682a0b5a4992e106911be6929.jpg.webp)

## Russia fails to rejoin UN's human rights council

The state was expelled from the body last April after its forces invaded Ukraine.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![India's Foreign Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar addresses the 78th United Nations General Assembly at UN headquarters in New York City on September 26, 2023.](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/17D00/production/_131263579_gettyimages-1689956921-594x594.jpg.webp)

## India asks Canada for evidence on Sikh murder

Foreign Minister S Jaishankar said India was open to looking into any "specific" details on the killing.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky addresses the UN General Assembly in New York. Photo: 19 September 2023](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/C119/production/_131133494_7f981363edbfc6c63df464ebddbf68ec5990a792-1.jpg.webp)

## Russian 'evil cannot be trusted' - Zelensky tells UN

The world must unite to end Russia's aggression, Ukraine's president tells the UN General Assembly.

![](https://static.files.bbci.co.uk/bbcdotcom/web/20250814-092707-b0ec5bc3fc-web-2.27.1-1/grey-placeholder.png)
![Zelensky](https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/480/cpsprodpb/6B29/production/_131133472_p0gfj6jr.jpg.webp)

## Zelensky: Thousands of children abducted by Russia

Ukraine's president compared Russia's abduction of children in occupied territories to 'genocide'.
